About The Pasta Factory The Pasta Factory is a Fast Food restaurant located at 1020 E Broadway in Columbia, MO 65201. The Pasta Factory has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Banquet Rooms, Italian Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for The Pasta Factory
All Reviews for The Pasta Factory
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
I really enjoyed this restaurant. I've been there twice and both times my food was wonderful. My husband seems to think that they use too much salt in their cooking. I don't think so! Anyhow, the atmosphere is great and the service was excellent too! A bit pricey but I thought it was well worth it!
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
